preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: This is an initial pre-alpha for the Maven Cookbook.

section.title: Revision History
section.para: Many readers have been asking us to keep track of specific changes to the book content, the following sections list changes made to the book in reverse chronological order starting with ${project.version}.

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.1
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 0.1:

listitem.para: Update the Book to Nexus 1.3.4
Modified the Book Build to use the Multimodule Project Structure details in this blog post.
Added a Cover to the PDF of the Nexus Book.
Added a promotional page to the PDF Book.
Added a Back Cover to the PDF Book.
Removed the Old Title Page

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.8
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 0.8 on April 20, 2009:

listitem.para: Update the Book to Nexus 1.3.3
Add Section about PGP Keyserver Configuration in Server Administration
Update Screenshot and Instructions for Configuring a New Procured Repository
Update Screenshot and Instructions in Procurement of Enabling Remote Downloads for a Proxy Repository
Update the Procurement Installation Section to Include an Updated Screenshot of Menu Links

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.7
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 0.7 on April 9, 2009:

listitem.para: Updated book for the Nexus 1.3.2 release
Added Instructions for the Maven Nexus Plugin
Added Section about Staging Artifact Upload
Added Section about new Staging Repository Description Field
Documented the new M2 Settings Templates Feature
Fixed Section Numbering Issues in Procurement (Section 8.3)
Updated Book to Reflect the Combination of the Two Staging Screens
Updated Section on Artifact Upload to reflect new GAV info and Artifact Upload Changes
Updated Staging Profiles Notification Preferences - Staging notification is now role-based
Added a Revision History to the Nexus Book Foreword
Changed the Terminology for Transition in the Staging Chapter: "Finish" is now "Closed"

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.6
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 0.6 on April 2, 2009:

listitem.para: Updated book for the Nexus 1.3.1.1 release
